column4: I have a windows xp machine with a 200gb HD. I want to install ubuntu server on 25 gb of that free space. But I have to have windwos for work. If I install ubuntu and I then use gparted livecd to get that space back to windows if I need to.?
do you have another hard driver you could attach ?
the only problem I can forsee is when you remove the ubuntu server partition you will have to reinstall the mbr for windows I believe
